title: Chieftain

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose someone, and their abilities will be **buffed**. Make sure you know who you're targeting. This could buff a Mafia member's abilities too, or something worse. This could be a double-edged sword, so beware.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Voting a player? Become a makeshift mayor, as your vote is worth three people's. To make sure this is still **balanced**, you can't change your vote to anyone besides your original target.
- Self-targeting isn't available to you.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: No difference here. Just your average Town goal.
